'''''Mythlore'' 87''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol23/iss1/ Volume 23, Issue 1]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* Christopher, Joe R. "Is Man a Myth? Mere Christian Perspectives on the Human."
* Rausher, Eric. "From Dubric to Taliessen: Charles Williams's Early Work on the Arthurian Cycle."
* Manganiello, Dominic. "''Till We Have Faces'': From Idolatry to Revelation."
* Flieger, Verlyn. "J.R.R. Tolkien and the Matter of Britain."
* Filmer-Davies, Cath. "On Fantasy Stories."

====Features====

*Sherman, Theodore James. Editorial.
*Letters.

==== Reviews ====

* ''The C. S. Lewis Readerâ€™s Encyclopedia.'' Foreword by Christopher Mitchell. Ed. Jeffrey D. Schultz and John G. West. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''The Letters of Dorothy L. Sayers.'' Vol. 3. Ed. Barbara Reynolds. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''Roverandom.'' Tolkien, J. R. R. Ed. Christina Scull and Wayne G. Hammond. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
